item.title: Connect to Airport Extreme Shared Disk from Linux
item.description: Recently I bought an Apple Airport Extreme to improve WiFi connectivity at home, I’m very happy with the results! Airport Extreme allows you to share a hard drive over the network, since one of my computers runs Linux I decided to modify my fstab to auto mount the sared drive into the Linux box.
